alert.note: Alert for Catoosa; Chattooga; Dade; Walker (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 7:08PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Catoosa, Walker, Dade and northwestern Chattooga Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 708 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Tracy City to near Section, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Ringgold, Trenton, Fort Oglethorpe, Rossville, Chickamauga, Trion, Lookout Mountain, Chattanooga Valley, La Fayette, Menlo, Center Post, Blue Spring, Fairview, Linwood, Cloudland, Chattanooga Valley, Hooker, Cloudland Canyon State Park and Cooper Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northwestern Georgia.
